pullrequest.title: Generalized Optitrack for different project files

content.raw:
This code is running on beefy (with Motive running on the VM for tracking).

@caguero, we will have to update OptitrackBridge to publish the markers for it to be compatible with this PR. I can take a stab at this if you're busy.
content.html:
This code is running on beefy (with Motive running on the VM for tracking).

@caguero, we will have to update OptitrackBridge to publish the markers for it to be compatible with this PR. I can take a stab at this if you're busy.
